actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to expand the imposition of sanctions under the Uyghur Human Rights Policy Act of 2020 with respect to human rights abuses in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China and to counter the genocidal policies of the Government of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
short_title: Uyghur Genocide Accountability and Sanctions Act of 2025

titles.title: Uyghur Genocide Accountability and Sanctions Act of 2025
Uyghur Genocide Accountability and Sanctions Act of 2025

A bill to expand the imposition of sanctions under the Uyghur Human Rights Policy Act of 2020 with respect to human rights abuses in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China and to counter the genocidal policies of the Government of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
